In 6 weeks, 300,000 Chinese in Nanjing were brutally murdered by Japanese invaders after they captured the city on Dec. 13, 1937.
Even though #China is much more developed, as a Chinese, I'll never forget this brutal war-torn history of my country.
#NanjingMassacre https://t.co/E0ehODyD7X
